summary: Prototype Pollution vulnerability (CVE-2022-25878) in protobufjs 6.11.2 dependency with CVSS 7.5 severity. Vulnerability allows attackers to modify Object.prototype properties through untrusted input or .proto file parsing.
userImpact: Users of the TypeScript SDK may be exposed to prototype pollution attacks if protobufjs dependency is not upgraded.
rootCause: Prototype Pollution vulnerability in protobufjs versions before 6.11.3 allows modification of Object.prototype through untrusted input or .proto file parsing.
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed by Mend after the vulnerable library was marked as ignored or removed from the Mend inventory.
keyQuote: The package protobufjs before 6.11.3 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution which can allow an attacker to add/modify properties of the Object.prototype.
